msg: THRIFT-244. cpp: Make TJSONProtocolFactor inherit from TProtocolFactory

author: dreiss
msg: uint8_t is a character type, so lexical_cast doesn't convert it

author: jukka
msg: TIKA-185: XML files with (unsatisfied) SYSTEM entities can not be extracted
Implemented an OfflineContentHandler decorator class that makes the XML parser silently ignore all external entities (they are replaced by an empty string).
Use the OfflineContentHandler in the XML and OpenOffice parsers. Also enable the secure XML parsing feature.
